name: Round Foot
description:
RoundFoot is a party game where you have a shield and have to defend your goal and your body from the ball. Hit the ball with your shield to smash the other's goal, the last in the game get a point.

This game in Beta, it has no sound yet and may contain bugs : send me a pick if you found one ! It also has no option, but you can change the size of the window as you like !

To develop this game I was inspired by the game Pong by bring it up-to-date. I also wanted to have practically 3 base texture (with different resolutions) : a disk, a circle and a rectangle, and just modulate those in my engine (Godot).
